name: react-seed
description: a scaffold for building React apps with ES7 and webpack
author: Marco

devDependencies.file-loader: # 1.x.x version of file-loader is not compatible with a bunch of loaders, i.e. css-loader, html-loader, ..., https://github.com/webpack-contrib/file-loader/issues/181#issuecomment-318230691, https://github.com/webpack-contrib/html-loader/issues/140#issuecomment-320546696
